ExternalAccountProvider.description: A remote service that can provide accounts for this manager to utilize for authentication.
ExternalAccountProvider.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent external user account services for this manager.

title: #ExternalAccountProvider.ExternalAccountProvider
